Khushiyon se ho naa koyi doori,
Rahe na koi khwaahish adhoori,
Rango se bhare es mausam mei,
Rangeen ho aapki duniya poori.
🌟🌟Happy Holi🌟🌟
1: Live the life you’ve always imagined!
2: You have to be ‘ODD’ to be number ‘ONE’.
3: Be silent and let your success shout!

5: Dreams don’t have expiration dates, keep going.
6: So many of my #smiles begin with #you.

Today, I got Vaccinated the first dose of covaxin.

By vaccinating today, you’re bringing the world closer tomorrow.
Vaccines bring us closer to a world where we can travel ✈️, protected together from the threat of preventable diseases.
So if you are not vaccinated yet then visit official site cowin.gov.in and book your slot in your nearest center.
8: You know you’re in #love when you can’t fall #asleep because #reality is finally better than your #dreams.
11: May all your wishes come true! #Merry_Christmas 🎅
